author: Lai Siu Chiu J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Romar Positioning Equipment Pte Ltd v Merriwa Nominees Pty Ltd

tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Pleadings/Amendment/Whether late amendment to Reply introducing inconsistent plea not found in Statement of Claim should have been allowed
